title: New Lux skin idea
body: The image is from Google. I don't take the credit for it

replies.body: Lol it's like Lux is cosplaying LB.
It looked like {{champion:134}} to me xD

Here's my remark to WARNED and YESHITH;
Yes.

> [{quoted}](name=yeshthisisdog,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=dbJAmZhT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-23T18:32:16.316+0000)
>
> Lol it's like Lux is cosplaying LB.

I agree, it DOES look like that. But I actually like this skin idea. Maybe it'll come true for me <3

I agree it does look like something LB would wear.
I just want a lux skin where it's not screaming military influence. Maybe a more lighthearted one!
"Old" Lux skin idea
It is new since it is not in the game. Just a suggestion for a new lux skin to be introduced

An old idea for a new skin.
Title says "new idea", which is false.

Get your facts right.
Actually it says new skin idea. It's an idea for the next lux skin

You just confirmed what I wrote in the previous post.

It's an OLD IDEA for a NEW SKIN.

This fanart was uploaded on deviantArt on 23rd of July 2014.
Hey look guys! It's Syndra!
That Void Lux picture has been floating around for quite a while. I'd still buy it, but I personally want a brighter themed skin before we get a darker themed one.

> [{quoted}](name=RavenHusky,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=dbJAmZhT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-23T18:56:17.075+0000)
>
> That Void Lux picture has been floating around for quite a while. I'd still buy it, but I personally want a brighter themed skin before we get a darker themed one.

All she has are magic themed or military,and the only steel legion changes anything and its still light,its about time we get a dark themed one

Is this art still "New"?
I've seen it reposted on here AT LEAST 12 gajillion times.
AT LEAST
Her face....
I've seen this on the boards so many times now.
They'd have to move her eyes close together first though.

Yeah, something that everyone else kinda caught on, there would be clarity issues if her W looked like syndra's dark sphere. In the heat of battle, one may think it to be Allied syndra's harmless ball, but in reality... LAZZZZOOORRREDDDDD.
I love Lux, but I wouldn't want this skin... which is really sad to say because she hasn't had a new skin in such a long time. "Good-turned-evil" is such a tired concept.
cool thing...
do I get something for being the 100th yes answerer cause I am the 100th yes answerer
Cosplay Lux
I would get it mixed up with Syndra too much.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/OFyfY8YK-dark-magician-lux-anyone

I've never really cared for the "lighthearted" Lux concepts that have floated around the forums for so long. Steel Legion might be military-themed (I like to think of it as Torchlight-themed, personally), but it has new spell effects that are bright.

We've been needing an evil/dark (*cough* Void *cough*) Lux skin with darker-colored particles for ages. Riot could give her a voice filter like Forsaken Jayce has.
TBH this looks  like TA from Dota 2

[](http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/204/c/3/skin_lux_oscura_by_cmorilla-d7rxyqk.jpg)As a Lux main i would buy the dying crap out of this skin, even the whole concept of "dark light" is impossible.
Looks like Hyliart.
I want this soo bad!
